Text.Name: Item_BambooShoot
Text.Desc: A few bamboo shoots. The root of bamboo that can be used for cooking, crunchy and refreshing.

Text.Name: Item_Bamboo
Text.Desc: A bundle of bamboos that can be used to make fishing rods and some buildings. Only edible to pandas.

Text.Name: Item_FishStick
Text.Desc: A fishing rod. Some fishes are attracted by specific elements and they also only show up at different time. Besides, the higher tier the rod is, the higher rate it will catch rare fishes.

Text.Name: Item_PandaJade
Text.Desc: A jade found at the bamboo forest. It seems to be one of a set of items.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Inspect
